OpenWasteland.description: Flat, exposed terrain with clear sightlines. Easy navigation but no cover.

ModerateRuins.description: Partially collapsed urban areas with recognizable streets. Moderate navigation difficulty.

DenseRuins.description: Heavily damaged urban zones with blocked paths and unstable structures. Difficult navigation.

Labyrinthine.description: Complex maze of collapsed buildings and debris. Very difficult navigation.

GlitchedLabyrinth.description: Reality-warped maze affected by Glitch corruption. Compasses fail. Extreme navigation difficulty.

Clear.description: Good visibility, optimal conditions for navigation.

Fog.description: Very poor visibility, significant navigation penalty.

compass.description: Working compass provides +1d10 to navigation. Ineffective in glitch-corrupted terrain.

advancedCompass.description: Advanced navigation device provides +2d10. Still fails in glitch-corrupted terrain.

glitchCompass.description: Glitch-shielded compass works even in corrupted terrain.

familiarTerritoryBonus.description: Familiarity with an area provides +2d10 to navigation checks.

nightPenalty.description: Traveling at night without a light source imposes -2d10 to navigation.

PartialSuccess.description: Reached destination with minor delays. Travel took 25% longer.

Failure.description: Got lost! Must backtrack. Travel takes 50% longer.

Fumble.description: Critically lost! Stumbled into a dangerous area. Other consequences apply.

outcomeThresholds.description: Net >= DC: Success. Net >= DC-2: Partial. Net < DC-2: Failure. 0 successes + botch: Fumble.

HazardZone.description: Area with environmental hazards: radiation, toxic chemicals, unstable structures.

HostileTerritory.description: Territory controlled by hostile forces: raiders, mutants, or territorial fauna.

GlitchPocket.description: Area of concentrated reality distortion. Strange phenomena and risk of Glitch corruption.

fumbleConsequence.description: Character becomes Disoriented and cannot attempt navigation until recovered.

balanceNotes.speedProgression: Speed decreases roughly 20% per tier for difficult terrain
balanceNotes.modifierStackLimit: No hard cap on modifier stacking, but practical range is -6 to +5
balanceNotes.designIntent: Navigation should feel risky in difficult terrain without being impossible for skilled characters
